SC_NightWithLaezel.synopsis: After the goblin hunt celebration party, this companion has made arrangements to get intimate with the player at night.

SC_NightWithLaezel_103.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_103.text: A dragon's heart beats inside you. A dragon's blood heats your flesh.
SC_NightWithLaezel_103.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player walks up the to the misty ruins of a fort, all that remains is a stone outline of where the structure once stood. A single corner has survived mostly intact, providing shelter and privacy.

SC_NightWithLaezel_81.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_81.text: It is time I take what's mine.
SC_NightWithLaezel_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~...and steps backwards, shadows swallowing her. The player follows for a few steps then stops, having found a shaft of light but losing Laezel to the darkness.

SC_NightWithLaezel_20.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel walks into one of the beams of light, she's undressed

SC_NightWithLaezel_148.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_148.text: Put your previous confrontation with Lae'zel out of your mind. Give in to her demand.

SC_NightWithLaezel_66.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_66.text: Close your eyes. You are hers.

SC_NightWithLaezel_95.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player closes their eyes and Laezel smiles and steps forward, into the cloak of surrounding shadow

SC_NightWithLaezel_32.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_32.text: *A pause. And then the flicker of a tongue across your neck.*
SC_NightWithLaezel_32.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel steps in behind the player from nowhere, the player almost flinches feeling her breath on th back of their neck
~Lazael closes her eyes and gently licks the back of the player's neck, then blows on the wet spot, opening her eyes again
~Her head almost drifts to the front of the player's, partially lit by the thing shaft of light as she guides the player in to darkness

SC_NightWithLaezel_36.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel leads the player to an other island of light, their sihouettes cutting through a composition framing a waiting bedroll
~Laezel guides the player down and they lay side by side

SC_NightWithLaezel_71.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_71.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel turns the player head toward hers, eyes still shut. She hold's the player's head there in front of hers

SC_NightWithLaezel_127.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_127.text: Enough. I want no more of this.

SC_NightWithLaezel_31.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_31.text: *You are a lapdog, Lae'zel's to command. Never has domination tasted so good and felt so freeing.*

SC_NightWithLaezel_53.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_53.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player kisses Lazael, passionately, eyes remaing shut, the break "Good. Lower." and the player kisses down Laezel's body. Laezel's back arches in response.

SC_NightWithLaezel_7.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The two roll off the bedroll and into darkness, locked together.
~The player's hand lands in a pool of light, Laezel's reaches out to collect it.

SC_NightWithLaezel_156.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_156.text: *You awake in pain. Your back, your hands, even your tongue ache.*
SC_NightWithLaezel_156.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Still dark. Then fade in to scene.
Time passes. You awake to see Lae'zel already with armour on.

SC_NightWithLaezel_87.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_87.text: It's time I return to my bunk.

SC_NightWithLaezel_38.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_38.text: Hold on - I need a moment to recover.

SC_NightWithLaezel_120.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_120.text: Do you think we could make love again soon?

SC_NightWithLaezel_33.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_33.text: Go to sleep. Our hunt resumes at sunup.

SC_NightWithLaezel_5.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_5.text: *Every breath, every blink proves exhausting. Perhaps the morning will bring relief.*
SC_NightWithLaezel_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Lae'zel walks away and the player tries to follow, struggling to rise.

SC_NightWithLaezel_155.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_155.text: Come back to bed. It's not morning yet.

SC_NightWithLaezel_55.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_55.text: Shake off the ache and return to sleep.

SC_NightWithLaezel_138.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_138.text: Tonight was wonderful. I really enjoyed myself.

SC_NightWithLaezel_2.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_2.text: Do you think we could make love again soon?

SC_NightWithLaezel_9.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_9.text: Shake off the ache and go to sleep.

SC_NightWithLaezel_136.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_136.text: Why in such a hurry? Relax, come rest.

SC_NightWithLaezel_79.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_79.text: You made a fine partner. You will be an effective kith'rak.

SC_NightWithLaezel_35.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_35.text: *You awake in pain. Your back, your hands, even your tongue ache.*
SC_NightWithLaezel_35.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Still dark. Then fade in to scene.
Time passes. You awake to see Lae'zel already with armour on.

SC_NightWithLaezel_40.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_40.text: It's time to rise. Dawn is upon us.

SC_NightWithLaezel_54.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_54.text: Hold on. I need a moment to recover.

SC_NightWithLaezel_123.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_123.text: Do you think we could make love again soon?

SC_NightWithLaezel_98.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_98.text: Love? I might give you a lay, should my whims so take me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_46.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_46.text: But I won't give you love.

SC_NightWithLaezel_134.speaker: Narrator
SC_NightWithLaezel_134.text: *Every breath, every blink proves exhausting. A long day awaits you...*
SC_NightWithLaezel_134.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Lae'zel walks away and the player tries to follow, struggling to rise.

SC_NightWithLaezel_126.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_126.text: 'Next'? We seek purification. I might even lay you again, should my whims so take me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_0.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_0.text: But do not deceive yourself: our bond runs no deeper.

SC_NightWithLaezel_129.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_129.text: Up, now. The sun soon rises.

SC_NightWithLaezel_45.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_45.text: Come back to bed. It's early yet.

SC_NightWithLaezel_61.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_61.text: Shake off the ache and rise.

SC_NightWithLaezel_56.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_56.text: Last night was wonderful. I really enjoyed myself.

SC_NightWithLaezel_58.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_58.text: I am sure you learned much from my mastery, Gith-child. Your training continues apace.

SC_NightWithLaezel_115.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_115.text: You are a fit specimen. You might wield a silver sword of your own, should Vlaakith be so generous.

SC_NightWithLaezel_47.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_47.text: Of course you did. I'm as extraordinary in bed as I am on the battlefield.

SC_NightWithLaezel_130.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_130.text: Do you think we could make love again soon?

SC_NightWithLaezel_119.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_119.text: Are you so offended by truth? You will find no better lay.

SC_NightWithLaezel_88.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_88.text: My hunger is sated for now, yes.

SC_NightWithLaezel_122.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_122.text: I might even lay you again, should my whims so take me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_116.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_116.text: Shake off the ache and rise.

SC_NightWithLaezel_83.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_83.text: Why in such a hurry? Relax, come rest.

SC_NightWithLaezel_73.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_73.text: Time for pleasure has passed. I might take more later, should my whims so carry me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_51.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_51.text: You made a fine partner. You will be an effective kith'rak.

SC_NightWithLaezel_13.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_13.text: Of course. I'm as extraordinary a lover as I am warrior.

SC_NightWithLaezel_29.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_29.text: You are a fit specimen yourself, kin. Fit enough to wield a silver sword of your own, should Vlaakith be so generous.

SC_NightWithLaezel_48.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_48.text: Yes, of course. We will leave at first light.

SC_NightWithLaezel_144.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_144.text: I do not submit. And I don't want submission from you. Show me your rage.

SC_NightWithLaezel_78.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_78.text: No. You submit to me. After, you can take whatever you desire.

SC_NightWithLaezel_140.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_140.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel holds the players gaze for a bit, smiles,then backs out of her ray of light
~She drops into another island of light, a bedroll in the corner "I am ready."
~ The player approaches, their sihouette cutting through Laezel in the composition

SC_NightWithLaezel_104.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The player lowers themselves over top of Laezel, supporting themself on the wall
Laezel reaches up from below and kisses the player, fingers sratching their shoulder blades then down their back, then reaching under.
The player straightens, then relaxes into a kiss

SC_NightWithLaezel_149.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The two roll off the bedroll and into darkness, locked together.
~The Laezel's hand lands in a pool of light, the player's reaches out to collect it.

SC_NightWithLaezel_59.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_59.text: That isn't how it's going to go. You submit to me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_80.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_80.text: You misunderstand. Allow me to be plain.

SC_NightWithLaezel_86.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_86.text: You are here for my pleasure.

SC_NightWithLaezel_152.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_152.text: In my pleasure, you will have yours.

SC_NightWithLaezel_52.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_52.text: A final chance, then, to find bliss. Close your eyes. Submit to me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_10.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_10.text: Submit? What do you intend to do?

SC_NightWithLaezel_84.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_84.text: I intend to take my pleasure. Say the word 'no', and you will go untasted.
SC_NightWithLaezel_84.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Laezel steps out of her ray of light, vanishing again

SC_NightWithLaezel_8.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_8.text: Say 'yes', and you brave turbulent waters.
SC_NightWithLaezel_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~She steps into the doorframe, silhouetting herself for a moment

SC_NightWithLaezel_89.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_89.text: You misunderstand. I will not submit to you, but you to me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_49.speaker: Player
SC_NightWithLaezel_49.text: You misunderstand. I will not submit to you, but you to me.

SC_NightWithLaezel_77.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_77.text: You would deny yourself further pleasure?
SC_NightWithLaezel_77.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The shutters of the guardhouse open as Laezel allows light into the guard house

SC_NightWithLaezel_37.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_37.text: Have it your way. We depart come dawn, and no later.
SC_NightWithLaezel_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Leaning on the sill, she looks over shoulder for a momentNodeContext: Lae'zel sits up. The tone changes drastically.

SC_NightWithLaezel_154.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_154.text: And you will take your rest alone.

SC_NightWithLaezel_124.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_124.text: Gith train relentlessly. We know our bodies inside and out.
SC_NightWithLaezel_124.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~The player walks up the to the misty ruins of a fort, all that remains is a stone outline of where the structure once stood. A single corner has survived mostly intact, providing shelter and privacy.
~Laezel waits inside the stone parameter of some ruins as the player approaches, when they get close enough to see where she's headed, she guides them to walks over to the doorway of an old guard house
~She walks to the doorway facing the inside, it's pitch black, save a few shafts of light breaking between the slats of a wooden roof. She turns to face the player, arms on the doorway, placing a hand on the door frame

SC_NightWithLaezel_110.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_110.text: It is time you knew mine.
SC_NightWithLaezel_110.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~...and steps backwards, shadows swallowing her. The player follows for a few steps then stops, having found a shaft of light but losing Laezel to the darkness.

SC_NightWithLaezel_92.speaker: Lae'zel
SC_NightWithLaezel_92.text: Let me show you. Close your eyes - and submit.
SC_NightWithLaezel_92.context:
CinematicNodeContext: ~...and steps backwards, shadows swallowing her. The player follows for a few steps then stops, having found a shaft of light but losing Laezel to the darkness.
~Laezel walks into one of the beams of light, she's undressed
